sentences.sentence: Chlorine is introduced into the ortho-position of aniline.
Its isomerization is aimed at increasing the yields of para - and ortho - xylenes.
sentences.translation: 其异构化的目的是提高对二甲苯和邻二甲苯的收率。

sentences.sentence: The ortho-mode transducer adopts the design idea of square waveguide stepped impedance matching and waveguide slot coupling.
sentences.translation: 正交模转换器采用方波导阶梯阻抗匹配与波导缝隙耦合的设计思想。
